title: Checkup & Cleaning
summary: Comprehensive exam, gentle cleaning, and low‑dose digital X‑rays.
steps: Medical history review and smile goals
details: Regular checkups prevent small issues from becoming big treatments. Our hygienists use gentle techniques and modern tools for a comfortable visit.

title: Tooth‑Colored Filling
summary: Natural‑looking composite filling to repair small cavities.
details: Composite fillings match your tooth shade and bond chemically, preserving more healthy enamel than metal fillings.

title: Root Canal Therapy
summary: Relieves pain by treating inflamed or infected tooth pulp.
details: Modern root canals are comfortable and predictable. They save your natural tooth and stop infection.

title: Professional Whitening
summary: Safely brightens teeth by multiple shades under dentist guidance.
details: Dentist‑supervised whitening maximizes results while protecting enamel and gums.

title: Dental Implant
summary: Replaces a missing tooth root with a titanium post and crown.
details: Implants are the gold standard for replacing missing teeth—stable, natural‑looking, and long‑lasting.

title: Clear Aligners
summary: Nearly invisible trays to straighten teeth comfortably.
details: Aligners fit your lifestyle—remove to eat, brush, and for special moments.
